Text: Popular American eyewear brand, Transitions, is a leading provider of professional recommended photochromic lenses worldwide. They recently made an addition in their collection of Photochromic lenses with the launch of a new iconic color. Their adaptive lenses, which were earlier available in brown and gray colors, can now also be accessed in Graphite Green Color. The new iconic Signature shade, Graphite Green tints lenses, are designed to suit every frame and personal style, and offers more natural vision and true color perception. Fashion freaks can now easily find these lenses at Kounopt.com.Transitions Signature Graphite Green lenses have been made using their exclusive Chromea7™ technology that allows lenses to reduce distracting, discomforting and disabling glare, both indoors and outdoors. The photochromic molecules of lenses provides the benefits of extra protection from light and a superior visual experience in any light condition.Jim Kounnas, CEO of America’s leading online optical store Kounopt.com, consider the launch of Transitions’ new photochromic lenses as an exciting move by the Brand. He said “We had always aimed at presenting branded lenses to our customers. Transitions is already a popular name amongst consumers due to their high quality lenses which transforms any eye frame into a striking eyeglasses. Transitions Signature Graphite Green lenses, made from their patented technology, will make lenses more responsive than ever before. Not only they will protect their eyes but will also enhance the look of any face. The range extension will allow Kounopt to meet demands of larger number of customers, and we will be very pleased to do so.”The new range of Transitions Signature Lenses has been inspired by the U.S. Navy pilot eyeglasses from the 1950s. Along with the new edition of Graphite Green lenses, Transitions’ range of Photochromic lenses includes colors of gray and brown. Kounopt.com is one of the authentic suppliers of eyeglasses and sunglasses from popular brands around the world at highly competitive prices and the Graphite Green from Transitions will perfectly complements their many frame styles and colors. Eyeglasses owners will be able to acquire the new Photochromic range at Kounopt’s online store.About the Author:Kounopt.com is one of the leading providers of the quality eyeglasses, frames and sunglasses online. We provide advanced hi-tech freeform lenses using the latest machinery and software from the US and Europe. We have a huge selection of name brand eyeglasses such as Silhouette, Carrera, and Calvin Klein including thousands of discount eyeglasses. Our range of men’s eyeglasses, women’s eyeglasses and kids’ eyeglasses cover full frames, semi-rimless and rimless eyeglasses. We also have designer sunglasses such Prada, Gucci, and Silhouette of course with many frames suitable for fitting prescription lenses which can be supplied as transitions, polarized and full tinted lenses. We provide free shipping worldwide. Established 1986 as a bricks and mortar establishment and online since 1999. One of the first Companies to do so.
